name: Super Plantoid
description:
Super Plantoid is a plant-based metroidvania where you play as an astrobotanist who crash-lands on an alien planet. Use your botanical skills to navigate the treacherous alien landscape and find a way to refuel your rocket, but be careful... the plant life might not be vegetarian.

Your goal is to collect all four solar flowers and then return to your rocket. Seeds you pick up along the way will give you access to new plants that you can plant and harvest fruits from. Various optional collectibles also offer an extra challenge.

Credits:

Programming

- Bartosz “Sztobar” Szewczyk

Art and Level Design

Music and SFX
